auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account yet? Sign up

dashboard.employeeMessage: Ready to achieve your goals today?
dashboard.activityWillAppear: Your latest actions and notifications will appear here.
dashboard.profileConfigured: Your profile has been successfully configured. You can now:
dashboard.createManageObjectives: Create and manage your project objectives

projects.createManageProjects: Create and manage your client projects
projects.allUsersCanCreate: All users can create projects. You automatically become the project referent. Click on a project to see its details.
projects.countryNote: You can only see users from your country for collaborators.
projects.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, client, description or referent...
projects.noProjectsFound: No projects match your search criteria.
projects.noProjectsCreated: No projects have been created yet.
projects.automaticReferent: You automatically become the referent of this project. Collaborators can be added now or later from the project management page.
projects.confirmFinish: Are you sure you want to mark this project as completed? This action will automatically trigger self-evaluations for all project collaborators.
projects.evaluationsRequired: Collaborators have been notified to complete their self-evaluation.
projects.noCollaborators: No collaborators assigned to this project

projectSheets.title: Project Sheets
projectSheets.subtitle: Manage your objectives and self-evaluations for each project
projectSheets.contactManager: You are not currently assigned to any project. Contact your manager to be added to projects.

objectives.defineSMARTObjectives: Define your SMART objectives for this project
objectives.startDefining: Start by defining your development objectives for this project.
objectives.availableSkills: Available skills from your career pathway
objectives.careerPathwayInfo: You can select skills from your career pathway or create custom objectives.
objectives.addObjectivesInfo: Add objectives from your career pathway or create custom objectives

evaluation.followEvaluationProcess: Follow the evaluation process for your objectives
evaluation.evaluateObjectivesAchievement: Evaluate the achievement of your objectives
evaluation.defineObjectivesFirst: You must first define your development objectives.
evaluation.evaluationAvailableWhenCompleted: Self-evaluation will be available once the project is completed.
evaluation.projectCompletedEvaluate: The project is completed. You can now evaluate your objectives.
evaluation.referentWillEvaluate: The referent will be able to evaluate you once you have submitted your self-evaluation.
evaluation.evaluationSubmitted: Your self-evaluation has been submitted. The referent will now proceed with their evaluation.
evaluation.evaluationNowComplete: Your evaluation is now complete and available for your coach
evaluation.evaluationTransmitted: This complete evaluation (self-evaluation + referent evaluation) is now transmitted to your coach for monitoring your professional development.
evaluation.evaluateEachObjective: Evaluate each of your objectives by indicating your level of achievement, your accomplishments, the difficulties encountered, and your learnings. This self-evaluation will then be reviewed by your project referent and your coach.
evaluation.achievementLevel: Level of achievement of the objective
evaluation.nextSteps: Next steps to continue developing this skill

annualObjectives.title: Annual Objectives
annualObjectives.subtitle: Define and track your professional development objectives
annualObjectives.configurationMessage: To create annual objectives, you must have a Career Pathway and a career level assigned. Contact your administrator or your coach to configure your profile.
annualObjectives.startByCreating: Start by creating your annual objectives based on your career pathway.

careerPathways.title: Career Pathways
careerPathways.discover: Discover professional development pathways and the skills required to progress in your career. Choose your area of expertise to explore the different levels and development themes.
careerPathways.adminModeMessage: You can create, modify, and delete career domains. Click on a domain to manage its themes and skills.
careerPathways.createFirstDomain: Create your first career domain to get started.
careerPathways.domainsComingSoon: Career domains will be available soon. Contact your administrator for more information.
careerPathways.chooseYourDomain: Choose your domain that matches your expertise or professional aspirations
careerPathways.exploreLevels: Explore levels to understand career progression in your domain
careerPathways.consultThemes: Consult themes to identify key skills to develop
careerPathways.planDevelopment: Plan your development with your manager or coach
careerPathways.noMatchingThemes: No themes match your search criteria.
careerPathways.noThemesAvailable: No development themes available for this domain.
careerPathways.noSkillsDefined: No skills defined for this level
careerPathways.exploreThemes: Explore themes to identify skills to develop in your domain
careerPathways.useFilters: Use filters to focus on a specific level
careerPathways.consultExamples: Consult examples to understand the practical application of skills
careerPathways.discussWithManager: Discuss with your manager or coach to define your personalized development plan

coaching.title: My Coaching
coaching.subtitle: Track evaluations and development of your coachees
coaching.noEvaluationsForCoachee: No finalized evaluations for this coachee.
coaching.noEvaluationsForAnyCoachee: No finalized evaluations from your coachees are available yet.
coaching.discussGap: Discuss the significant gap between self-evaluation and referent evaluation. Explore perceptions and expectations.
coaching.congratulateAlignment: Congratulate for the alignment of perceptions. Identify next development steps.

administration.title: Administration
administration.subtitle: Employee profile management and settings
administration.countryFilteringMessage: Users can only see profiles from their own country. Administrators can see all profiles but must assign a country to each user.
administration.employeeManagementMessage: New employees must be created via the "Authentication" tab in Supabase. Once created, they will automatically appear in this table and you can modify their information.
administration.emailModificationNote: Note: Email modification must be done directly in the Supabase dashboard for security reasons.
administration.manageDepartments: Add or remove departments in your company
administration.departmentsShared: Departments are shared between all countries.
administration.noEmployeesForCountry: No employees found for the selected country.
administration.employeesWillAppear: Employees created via Supabase Auth will appear here automatically.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your preferences and account settings
settings.contactAdminForChanges: To modify your personal information (name, email, department, etc.), please contact your administrator or HR department.
